languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс кивает.{/n} "Слова истинного имперца". {n}Дознаватель даже не пытается скрыть едкую ноту в голосе.{/n}
{n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс кивает.{/n} "Слова истинного имперца". {n}Дознаватель даже не пытается скрыть едкую ноту в голосе.{/n}

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希点了点头。{/n}“只有真正的帝国公民，才会说出这样的话。”{n}他丝毫不掩饰语气中的刻薄与挖苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希点了点头。{/n}“只有真正的帝国公民，才会说出这样的话。”{n}他丝毫不掩饰语气中的刻薄与挖苦。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix asiente.{/n} «Las palabras de un{mf||a} auténtic{mf|o|a} ciudadan{mf|o|a} del Imperium». {n}El interrogador no se molesta en disimular la mordacidad de sus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix asiente.{/n} «Las palabras de un{mf||a} auténtic{mf|o|a} ciudadan{mf|o|a} del Imperium». {n}El interrogador no se molesta en disimular la mordacidad de sus palabras.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがうなずく。{/n}「真の帝国市民の言葉」{n}インテロゲイターは言葉の辛辣さを隠そうともしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがうなずく。{/n}「真の帝国市民の言葉」{n}インテロゲイターは言葉の辛辣さを隠そうともしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hoche la tête.{/n} « Des paroles dignes {mf|d'un|d'une} véritable {mf|citoyen|citoyenne} de l'Imperium. » {n}L'interrogateur n'essaie même pas de cacher le ton caustique de ses paroles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hoche la tête.{/n} « Des paroles dignes {mf|d'un|d'une} véritable {mf|citoyen|citoyenne} de l'Imperium. » {n}L'interrogateur n'essaie même pas de cacher le ton caustique de ses paroles.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nickt.{/n} "So spricht {mf|ein wahrer Bürger|eine wahre Bürgerin} des Imperiums." {n}Der Interrogator versucht nicht einmal, den beißenden Unterton in seinen Worten zu verbergen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nickt.{/n} "So spricht {mf|ein wahrer Bürger|eine wahre Bürgerin} des Imperiums." {n}Der Interrogator versucht nicht einmal, den beißenden Unterton in seinen Worten zu verbergen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Gerçek bir İmparatorluk yurttaşına yakışan sözler." {n}Sorgucu, sözlerindeki iğnelemeyi gizleme gereği duymuyor bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods.{/n} "The words of a true citizen of the Imperium." {n}The Interrogator does not even try to hide the caustic edge to his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'un gerçek bir yurttaşına yakışan sözler." {n}Sorgucu, sözlerindeki iğnelemeyi gizleme gereği bile duymuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
